content.raw: As a note to myself for when we finally get around to doing this, the ClassRegister functionality is going to need some moderate reworking in order to find devices not in the main repository (the module search is basically hard-coded in the \__getitem__() method now). It took me longer than it should have to figure this out and I don't want to forget.
